scripts.docker-build: if [ -d './docker-mongo/cache' ]; then sudo rm -r ./docker-mongo/cache; fi; docker-compose build && npm run startdb
scripts.dev-mongo: if [ -d './docker-mongo/cache' ]; then sudo rm -r ./docker-mongo/cache; fi; docker run -d --name mongodb-dev -p 27017:27017 -v ${pwd}/docker-mongo/cache:/data/db mongo && docker exec -it mongodb-dev mkdir -p /database/ && docker cp ./docker-mongo/default-data mongodb-dev:/database/default-data && docker exec mongodb-dev mongorestore --drop /database/default-data && next dev
scripts.importdb: docker exec -it mongodb mkdir -p /database/ && docker cp ./docker-mongo/default-data mongodb:/database/default-data && docker-compose exec mongodb mongorestore --drop /database/default-data
scripts.startdb: docker-compose up -d && docker exec -it mongodb mkdir -p /database/ && docker cp ./docker-mongo/default-data mongodb:/database/default-data && docker-compose exec mongodb mongorestore --drop /database/default-data
scripts.updatedb: if [ -d './docker-mongo/default-data' ]; then rm -r ./docker-mongo/default-data; fi; docker-compose exec mongodb bash -c 'if [ -d '/database/default-data' ]; then rm -r /database/default-data; fi; mongodump --out=/database/default-data ' && docker cp mongodb:/database/default-data ./docker-mongo/default-data
